oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Contance Baker Motley correspondence with Raymond B. Witt, 1961 December 18
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Motley, Constance Baker, 1921-2005
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter detailing revisions to Raymond B. Witt's first draft of a list of disagreements between the defendants and plaintiffs in desegregating public schools in Chattanooga, Tennessee in accordance with the original Mapp v. Board of Education decision.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mapp v. Board of Education of Chattanooga; Segregation in education -- Law and legislation; Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education; United States. District Court (Tennessee : Eastern District)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1953-1961
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
